review: Setup was easy I'm happy with my purchase . Amazon.com is the best!
author: josephine rivera

review: This thing is amazing. I had no trouble getting it up and running, and because I have Prime I get so much programming. I highly recommend this to anyone - especially for people who are house bound - that want more from tv.
author: Lily "Susan"

review: Love the Fire TV Stick and couldn't be happier.  My children love it and movies and shows are always at your fingertips.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Turn any hdmi flat screen into a smart tv! Love it.
author: thelittlemartyj

review: I love my Amazon Fire TV Stick!  My Grandson order the Fire stick for me and it is so mush easier to use than my Phone.
author: Zoey Winters

review: This was a definite upgrade from our Chromecast. We'll be getting a FireTV box for the living room next. No complaints whatsoever, so far.Well... some of the apps do the derpiest ways of browsing through options. It would be great if you could do category/genre browsing on Netflix app.
author: E. Starr "Beakerz"

review: I didn,t see a lot of free movies from amazon
author: Eleanor
